// GENERATED CODE - PLEASE DO NOT EDIT

    private final com.gh.bmd.jrt.routine.Routine<?, ${resultClassName}> mRoutine${methodCount};

    private static class InvocationFactory${methodCount}${genericTypes} implements com.gh.bmd.jrt.invocation.InvocationFactory<Object, ${resultClassName}> {

        private final Object mMutex;

        private final java.lang.ref.WeakReference<${classFullName}> mWrapped;

        private InvocationFactory${methodCount}(
                @javax.annotation.Nonnull final java.lang.ref.WeakReference<${classFullName}> wrapped,
                @javax.annotation.Nullable final Object mutex) {

            mWrapped = wrapped;
            mMutex = mutex;
        }

        @javax.annotation.Nonnull
        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
        public com.gh.bmd.jrt.invocation.Invocation<Object, ${resultClassName}> newInvocation() {

            return new Invocation${methodCount}${genericTypes}(mWrapped, mMutex);
        }
    }

    @javax.annotation.Nonnull
    private com.gh.bmd.jrt.routine.Routine<?, ${resultClassName}> initRoutine${methodCount}(
            @javax.annotation.Nonnull final com.gh.bmd.jrt.builder.InvocationConfiguration configuration) {

        return com.gh.bmd.jrt.core.JRoutine.on(new InvocationFactory${methodCount}${genericTypes}(mWrapped, getMutex(${shareGroup})))
                                           .invocations()
                                           .with(configuration)
                                           ${routineBuilderOptions}
                                           .withInputMaxSize(Integer.MAX_VALUE)
                                           .withInputTimeout(com.gh.bmd.jrt.util.TimeDuration.ZERO)
                                           .withOutputMaxSize(Integer.MAX_VALUE)
                                           .withOutputTimeout(com.gh.bmd.jrt.util.TimeDuration.ZERO)
                                           .set()
                                           .buildRoutine();
    }
